Name: Abandonment
Description: Ups chances of evading enemy attack

Name: Aim for Counter
Description: Lets you sometimes counter after evasion

Name: Decoy
Description: Ups chances to be target of enemy attack

Name: Magic Recover
Description: Cuts IP recovery time after using magic

Name: Move Recover
Description: Cuts IP recovery time after using moves

Name: Item Recover
Description: Cuts IP recovery time after using items

Name: Skilled Item Use
Description: Cuts execution times for item commands

Name: Pirate's Ring
Description: Ups chances to get items after combat

Name: Full-Body Blow
Description: Ups IP damage from critical attack

Name: Magica Esoterica
Description: Adds cancel effect to some attack spells
